messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I need a break. How far are we from Christmas Day?
Sure—could you tell me your current date and time (including your time zone)? Once I have that, I can calculate exactly how far away Christmas Day is.
I don't know the current date and time.

To calculate the time until Christmas Day I need to know “now” in your locale. Could you tell me either:

1. Your current local date and time (including time zone),  
or  
2. Your location or time zone (so I can look up the current date/time for you)?

Once I have that, I can compute exactly how far away December 25th is.
I don't have that info. Can you search for me?

I don’t have a built-in way to look up your real-time clock or location automatically. To give you an accurate countdown to December 25, could you tell me at least your time zone or the city/region you’re in? That way I can fetch the correct “now” and compute how far away Christmas Day is.
I don't have the current date and time, so I'm not sure what to do. Can you find it online?

I don’t have any way to look up your real‐time clock automatically. To give you an accurate “countdown” until December 25 th, I need at least your time zone or current local date/time. 

Could you please tell me one of the following?

• Your time zone (e.g. “America/New_York” or “UTC+2”)  
• Your city or region (so I can infer your zone)  
• Or simply the current date and time you see on your device (with its time zone)

Once I have that, I can calculate exactly how far away Christmas Day is.
